name: summarise
constraint: (declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const GI0_SPEC Int)(assert (= (+ 1 GI0_SPEC) CO_SPEC))
(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const RI0_SPEC Int)(assert (< RO_SPEC RI0_SPEC))
(declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const CI0_SPEC Int)(assert (<= CO_SPEC (+ 1 CI0_SPEC)))
(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const IG0_SPEC Int)(assert (= IG0_SPEC RO_SPEC))
(declare-const IH0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OH_SPEC Int)(assert (>= (+ IH0_SPEC 1) OH_SPEC))
(declare-const IC0_SPEC Int)(declare-const IG0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OC_SPEC Int)(assert (>= (+ IC0_SPEC 1 IG0_SPEC) OC_SPEC))
